abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Deepening Medium Term Budget Framework (MTBF) and
            Strengthening Financial Accountability Project for
            Bangladesh is to deepen and institutionalize the MTBF and
            build a more strategic and performance oriented budget
            management process, while strengthening financial
            accountability across the expenditure management cycle. This
            restructuring will bring the following changes: (i) partial
            extension of the closing date by two months, from July 31,
            2014 to September 30, 2014 in order to provide the
            additional time needed for 26 scholarship students already
            enrolled in overseas master's programs to complete
            studies and fund costs related to scholarships for August
            and September 2014 from the project grant. Only expenditures
            related to the completion of overseas master's programs
            for the 26 scholarship students already enrolled will be
            eligible after July 31, 2014; (ii) a reallocation between
            spending categories to create a new spending category
            exclusively for expenditures eligible in the extension
            period; and (iii) an amendment to the grant agreement (GA)
            to formalize the above changes.
